roleset.name: generally acceptable, sufficient
roleset.note: DECENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from decent.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: For the room rate, room was decent.

example.name: treated me well
example.text: Stock market was decent to me today...

roleset.name: adequately skilled at
roleset.note: DECENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from decent.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Secretary Liu was quite decent in handling such a sudden incident . The Communist Party is led collectively . It is normal to study afterwards before a statement is made .
example.arg: in handling such a sudden incident

example.name: both args
example.text: My family has little money and I am decent at art, so my idea was to draw my girlfriend some roses using charcoal
